citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 PM on
30-MAR-17.
* Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensee’s house. Inspector then honked GOV horn and called
telephone numbers given by the licensee. Per telephone conservation, the licensee’s stated they were currently at
a scheduled appointment and could be home to do a facility inspection within 30 minutes.
* Copy of the inspection report was sent by regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 PM on
30-MAR-17.
* Inspector knocked on the front door of the licensee’s house.  Inspector then honked GOV horn and called
telephone numbers given by the licensee.  Per telephone conservation, the licensee’s stated they were currently at
a scheduled appointment and could be home to do a facility inspection within 30 minutes.
*   Copy of the inspection report was sent by regular mail.
